Wisdom: الْعَدْلُ مَأْلُوفٌ الْجَوْرُ عَسُوفٌ
enWisdom: Justice is brings harmony while oppression causes deviation

Wisdom: الْقِسْطُ خَيْرُ الشَّهَادَةِ
enWisdom: Justice is the best testimony

Wisdom: الْعَدْلُ فَوْزٌ وَكَرَامَةٌ
enWisdom: Justice is [a means of attaining]) success and dignity

Wisdom: الْعَدْلُ أَغْنَى الْغِنَاءِ [العقل‏]
enWisdom: Justice is the greatest of riches

Wisdom: الْعَدْلُ أَقْوَى أَسَاسٍ
enWisdom: Justice is the strongest foundation

Wisdom: الْعَدْلُ أَفْضَلُ سَجِيَّةٍ
enWisdom: Justice is the best trait

Wisdom: الْعَدْلُ يُرِيحُ الْعَامِلَ بِهِ مِنْ تَقَلُّدِ [تَقْلِيدِ] الْمَظَالِمِ
enWisdom: Justice relieves the one who acts upon it from being shackled by the rights of others

Wisdom: الْعَدْلُ رَأْسُ الْإِيمَانِ وَجِمَاعُ الْإِحْسَانِ [وَ أَعْلَى مَرَاتِبِ الْإِيمَانِ‏]
enWisdom: Justice is the cornerstone of faith and the accumulator of benevolence

Wisdom: الْعَدْلُ أَنَّكَ إِذَا ظُلِمْتَ أَنْصَفْتَ وَالْفَضْلُ أَنَّكَ إِذَا قَدَرْتَ عَفَوْتَ
enWisdom: Justice means that you act equitably when you are oppressed, and kindness means that when you gain authority, you forgive

Wisdom: اعْدِلْ فِيمَا وُلِّيتَ اشْكُرْ لِلَّهِ [اللَّهَ‏] فِيمَا أُولِيتَ
enWisdom: Be just in that which you have been given authority and thank Allah for that which has been granted to you

Wisdom: أَسْنَى الْمَوَاهِبِ الْعَدْلُ
enWisdom: The loftiest of endowments is justice

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الْعَدْلِ نُصْرَةُ الْمَظْلُومِ
enWisdom: The best [form of] justice is assisting the oppressed

Wisdom: إِنَّ مِنَ الْعَدْلِ أَنْ تُنْصِفَ فِي الْحُكْمِ وَتَجْتَنِبَ الظُّلْمَ
enWisdom: Verily being fair in [your] ruling and eschewing oppression are part of justice

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ أَمَرَ بِالْعَدْلِ وَالْإِحْسانِ وَنَهَى عَنِ الْفَحْشَاءِ وَالظُّلْمِ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, has enjoined justice and benevolence and has forbidden indecency and injustice

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْعَدْلِ نِظَامُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
enWisdom: Virtuous justice is [the cause of] organization [and harmony] among the people

Wisdom: شَيْئَانِ لَا يُوزَنُ ثَوَابُهُمَا الْعَفْوُ وَالْعَدْلُ
enWisdom: Two things are such that their reward cannot be weighed: forgiveness and justice

Wisdom: ضَادُّوا الْجَوْرَ بِالْعَدْلِ
enWisdom: Counter oppression with justice

Wisdom: فِي الْعَدْلِ الْإِحْسَانُ
enWisdom: In justice there is benevolence

Wisdom: فِي الْعَدْلِ سَعَةٌ وَمَنْ ضَاقَ عَلَيْهِ الْعَدْلُ فَالْجَوْرُ عَلَيْهِ أَضْيَقُ
enWisdom: In justice there is comfort; and one for whom justice is beleaguering, then oppression will be more beleaguering [and difficult] for him

Wisdom: مِنْ لَوَازِمِ الْعَدْلِ التَّنَاهِي عَنِ الظُّلْمِ
enWisdom: From the exigencies of justice is the forbidding of oppression

Wisdom: مِنْ عَلَامَاتِ النُّبْلِ الْعَمَلُ بِسُنَّةِ الْعَدْلِ
enWisdom: Acting on the principle of justice is from the signs of nobility

Wisdom: مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الِاخْتِيَارِ وَأَحْسَنِ الِاسْتِظْهَارِ أَنْ تَعْدِلَ فِي الْحُكْمِ وَتُجْرِيَهُ فِي الْخَاصَّةِ وَالْعَامَّةِ عَلَى السَّوَاءِ
enWisdom: One of the most excellent choices and best precautions [and supports] is for you to be just in your ruling (or judgment) and to carry it out among the special and the ordinary [people] equally

Wisdom: مِنْ عَلَامَاتِ الْعَقْلِ الْعَمَلُ بِسُّنَّةِ الْعَدْلِ
enWisdom: Acting on the [established] practice of justice is from the signs of intelligence

Wisdom: لَا عَدْلَ أَفْضَلُ مِنْ رَدِّ الْمَظَالِمِ
enWisdom: There is no justice better than returning the right of the oppressed

Wisdom: الْمُوَاسَاةُ أَفْضَلُ الْأَعْمَالِ
enWisdom: Giving financial support [to a believer] is the best of actions
